title: MAYDAY五月天 [ I Will Carry You ] Official Music Video

json.text: I Will Carry You
That is my only conviction
I Will Carry You Carry You
In five seconds you will reach the battlefield Holding onto what remains of your steadfast resolve
That which you choose not to forget Still keeps your fervor alive
Perspective decides right and wrong You need not be swayed by others opinions
The chicken soup for the soul you relied heavily upon Has long become poison for the soul
Some youths placed too much insistence on opposition They died before they were buried
There is no truth to this demonic war  Only you and I remain, fighting the same battle
I Will Carry You
That is my only conviction
I Will Carry You  Carry You
One cannot stand alone in this degenerate world Winning means nothing without you
I will stick with you in life or death That is our only conviction
Be it a dead end or an opportunity Give or take, we still got to go
Out of the myriad possibilities in life The nearest path is the path of no return
Sometimes suffering makes you realize The quest for glory is meant for common folk
In every war, someone wins and someone loses If I have to lose, I would rather lose with you
I Will Carry You  （We are right beside you）
That is my only conviction
I Will Carry You  （We will never forget） Carry You
I Will Carry You
What is winning without you
I Will Carry You  Carry You
I Will Carry You  （We are right beside you）
That is my only conviction
I Will Carry You  （We will never forget） Carry You
